presentationTable.name: Budget - Amount In Transaction Currency
presentationTable.description: A folder containing  measures related to workforce compensation budget , in transaction currency.

presentationColumns.name: Overall Budget Amount (Allocated)
presentationColumns.description: Total Budget amount allocated to a worksheet manager.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Compensation Budget.Overall Budget Amount (Allocated)

presentationColumns.name: Overall Budget Amount (Available)
presentationColumns.description: Budget amount left to be utilized by worksheet managers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Compensation Budget.Overall Budget Amount (Available)

presentationColumns.name: Overall Budget Amount (Used)
presentationColumns.description: Budget amount used by worksheet managers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Compensation Budget.Overall Budget Amount (Used)

presentationColumns.name: Total Eligible Salaries
presentationColumns.description: Sum of eligible salaries of workers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Compensation Budget.Total Eligible Salaries
